allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor decomposition methods and add Per-IMF training

- Baselines: Changed from CEEMDAN to CEEMD \(EEMD\) for base approach
- Features: Added Per-IMF training with rolling features
- EventLoss: Added Per-IMF training with event-weighted loss
- Full Model: Changed from CEEMD to CEEMDAN for advanced approach

Key changes:
- Baselines_model/src/decomposition.py: Now uses PyEMD.EEMD
- ceemdan_features_model/main.py: Complete rewrite with IMFFeatureDataset
- ceemdan_EVloss/main.py: Complete rewrite with IMFEventDataset
- Full_model/src/Data/Data_processor.py: Now uses PyEMD.CEEMDAN
- All models now use Per-IMF training \(train separate model per IMF\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
